summary: Vigilant of Stendarr as a follower
descriptionHtml:
Name: Frea Datterkite - Daedra Hunter Companion
Version: 1.0
Date: 2012/11/07



------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------

Hello again - I am glad to present you another companion.
I made it on my taste and hope you like her
Vigilants of Stendarr is the mysterious cast of warrior priests hunting and chasing the creatures of Dark world. Now you are able to have the Vigilant as a follower.
Frea Datterkite (in Norwegian language \"Datter kite\" means \"Daughter of kite\") is a Nord.
Eyes: Brown
Hair: Red
Calculated Lvls from 10 to 70
Specialization: Elementhal Mage
Destruction Spells, Cloaks, Fast Healing, Regeneration.
She is essential and also can be married.
Initial Outfit: Destruction Apprentice Mage Robe
Initial Weapon: Silver Sword


-------------------------[Location]-------------------------

Hall of the Vigilant. The location will appear on the map when you meet the Vigilants of Stendarr and talk to them. Or go to the south from Dawnstar. 




------------------- [Install] -----------------------
Please copy and overwrite in the \\ Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the SNFrea.esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod

------------------- [Requirements] -----------------------
IMPORTANT! YOU MUST HAVE APACHI SKYHAIR V1.3

Another moods you need as usual are:

Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
The Eyes Of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722
RANs Eyebrow Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701
UNP Female Body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
VAnilla Skin Texture v1-8 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

All cheers and credits to the modders whose mods are mentioned above!





------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
Feel free to modify, reuse or reupload elsewhere just give me credit.
Thanks Bethesda for great game


Tools used

Bethesda Creation Kit


Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
